thread.title: Teen Suicide Attempts in the U.S. Decreased After Same-Sex Marriage Was Legalized
thread.title_full: Teen Suicide Attempts in the U.S. Decreased After Same-Sex Marriage Was Legalized

author: Lisa Ryan
title: Teen Suicide Attempts in the U.S. Decreased After Same-Sex Marriage Was Legalized
text:
Teen suicide attempts in the U.S. dropped after same-sex marriage was legalized, a new study found. Researchers linked same-sex marriage policies to a 7 percent reduction in adolescent suicide attempts, and a 14 percent decrease among gay, lesbian, and bisexual teenagers, in particular.

Suicide is currently the second... More Â»
